name: Legend of Ravi
description: Legend of Ravi is a 2D isometric game set in the Himalayan mountains in Nepal and Tibet. You play a monkey called Ravi, and you start in a town that has been overrun with dark spirits. The player must combat dark spirits, find the seed and plant a tree. In this process, the player will learn about the town history and how Ravi and the tree are connected to the town and its peace.
